English Sentences: That which was from the beginning, which we have heard, which we have seen with our eyes, which we have looked upon, and our hands have handled, of the Word of life;
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni koiroosappe doommidi de7iya, nu aifiyan be7idi, nu kushiyan a bochchi be7ido de7uwaa qaalaabaa intteyyo xaafoos. Nuuni a be7ida; nu kusheekka a bochchi be7iis.

English Sentences: (For the life was manifested, and we have seen it, and bear witness, and shew unto you that eternal life, which was with the Father, and was manifested unto us;)
Wolaitta Sentences: He de7oi qonccin, nuuni a be7idi, abaa intteyyo markkattoos; qassi Aawaa matan de7iya nuuyyo qonccida merinaa de7uwaabaa intteyyo yootoos.

English Sentences: That which we have seen and heard declare we unto you, that ye also may have fellowship with us: and truly our fellowship is with the Father, and with his Son Jesus Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi nunaara intteyyo issippetettai de7ana mala, nuuni be7idoogaanne siyidoogaa intteyyo yootoos; nuuyyo Aawaaranne a Na7aa Yesuus Kiristtoosaara issippetettai de7ees.

English Sentences: And these things write we unto you, that your joy may be full.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni nu ufaissai polettana mala, hagaa intteyyo xaafoos.

English Sentences: This then is the message which we have heard of him, and declare unto you, that God is light, and in him is no darkness at all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni appe siyidi, intteyyo yootiyo kiitai, "Xoossai poo7o; aani xumi mulekka baawa" yaagiyaagaa.

English Sentences: If we say that we have fellowship with him, and walk in darkness, we lie, and do not the truth:
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni nuuyyo aara issippetettai de7ees giidi xuman de7ikko, nu haasayaaninne nu oosuwan worddotoos.

English Sentences: But if we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin poo7uwan i de7iyoogaadan, nuunikka poo7uwan de7ikko, nuuyyo issuwau issuwaara issippetettai de7ees; qassi a Na7aa, Yesuus Kiristtoosa suuttai nagara ubbaappe nuna ashshees.

English Sentences: If we say that we have no sin, we deceive ourselves, and the truth is not in us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni nunan nagari baawa giikko, nurkka nuna cimmoos; nunan tumatettikka baawa.

English Sentences: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin nuuni Xoossau nu nagaraa paaxikko, i nu nagaraa atto gaanaunne nu mooro ooso ubbaappe nuna geeshshanau, ammanttiyaagaanne tumubaa oottiyaagaa.

English Sentences: If we say that we have not sinned, we make him a liar, and his word is not in us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni nagara oottibookko giikko, Xoossaa worddanchcha kessoos; a qaalaikka nunan de7enna.

English Sentences: My little children, these things write I unto you, that ye sin not. And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta naatoo, nagara intte oottennaadan, taani hagaa intteyyo xaafais; shin ooninne nagara oottikko, Aawaa matan nuuyyo gaannatiya Yesuus Kiristtoosi, Xilloi, de7ees.

English Sentences: And he is the propitiation for our sins: and not for ours only, but also for the sins of the whole world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi nuuni nu nagaraa atto geetettaa Kiristtoosa baggaara demmeettees; Kiristtoosi yarshshettidoogee asa ubbaa nagaraassappe attin, nu nagaraa xalaalaassa gidenna.

English Sentences: And hereby we do know that we know him, if we keep his commandments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni Xoossaa azazuwaa naagikko, tumu a eriyoogaa hegan shaakkanau danddayoos.

English Sentences: He that saith, I know him, and keepeth not his commandments, is a liar, and the truth is not in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi urai, "Taani a erais" giidi, qassi a azazuwaa naagennan aggikko, he urai worddanchcha; tumatettikka aani baawa.

English Sentences: But whoso keepeth his word, in him verily is the love of God perfected: hereby know we that we are in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin a qaalau azazettiya oona gidikkonne, he urai Xoossaa siiqiyoogee tumu polettiis. Nuuni Xoossan de7iyoogaa hagee nuna erissees.

English Sentences: He that saith he abideth in him ought himself also so to walk, even as he walked.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani, "Xoossan de7ais" giya ooninne Kiristtoosi de7idoogaadan de7anau bessees.

English Sentences: Brethren, I write no new commandment unto you, but an old commandment which ye had from the beginning. The old commandment is the word which ye have heard from the beginning.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta ishatoo, taani intteyyo koiroosappe de7iya ceega azazuwaa xaafaisippe attin, ooratta azazo xaafikke; he ceega azazoi intte siyido qaalaa.

English Sentences: Again, a new commandment I write unto you, which thing is true in him and in you: because the darkness is past, and the true light now shineth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkokka, taani intteyyo naa77anttuwaa ooratta azazuwaa xaafais; he azazuwaa tumatettaikka Kiristtoosaaninne inttenan beettees. Aissi giikko, xumai xayees; tumu poo7oi ha77i poo7ees.

English Sentences: He that saith he is in the light, and hateth his brother, is in darkness even until now.
Wolaitta Sentences: Poo7uwan de7ais giiddi, ba ishaa ixxiya ooninne hanno gakkanaassikka xuman de7ees.

English Sentences: He that loveth his brother abideth in the light, and there is none occasion of stumbling in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba ishaa siiqiya ooninne poo7uwan de7ees; he uran hara ura xubbiyaabi aibinne baawa.

English Sentences: But he that hateth his brother is in darkness, and walketh in darkness, and knoweth not whither he goeth, because that darkness hath blinded his eyes.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ba ishaa ixxiya ooninne xuman de7ees; xuman hemettees. Xumai a aifiyaa qooqissi wottido gishshau, awu biyaakkonne erenna.

English Sentences: I write unto you, little children, because your sins are forgiven you for his name's sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta naatoo, Xoossai Kiristtoosa sunttaa gishshau, intte nagaraa atto yaagido gishshau, taani intteyyo xaafais.

English Sentences: I write unto you, fathers, because ye have known him that is from the beginning. I write unto you, young men, because ye have overcome the wicked one. I write unto you, little children, because ye have known the Father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aawatoo, koiroosappe de7iyaagaa intte erido gishshau, intteyyo xaafais. Yelagatoo, xalahe halaqaa intte xoonido gishshau, intteyyo xaafais. Guutta naatoo, Xoossaa intte erido gishshau, intteyyo xaafais.

English Sentences: I have written unto you, fathers, because ye have known him that is from the beginning. I have written unto you, young men, because ye are strong, and the word of God abideth in you, and ye have overcome the wicked one.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aawatoo, koiroosappe de7iyaagaa intte erido gishshau, intteyyo xaafais. Yelagatoo, intte mino gidiyo gishshaunne Xoossaa qaalai inttenan de7iyo gishshau, qassi xalahe halaqaa intte xoonido gishshau, intteyyo xaafais.

English Sentences: Love not the world, neither the things that are in the world. If any man love the world, the love of the Father is not in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha sa7aa woi sa7an de7iya aibanne siiqoppite. Intte ha sa7aa siiqikko, Xoossaa siiqoi inttenan baawa.

English Sentences: For all that is in the world, the lust of the flesh, and the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life, is not of the Father, but is of the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, ha sa7an de7iya ubbabai, hegeekka: asatettaa amoi, aifen xeellidi qaaqqatiyoogeenne miishshan ceeqettiyoogee ha sa7aappe yiidoogaappe attin, Xoossaappe yibeenna.

English Sentences: And the world passeth away, and the lust thereof: but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha sa7ainne ha sa7an asi amottiyo ubbabai aadhdhana. SHin Xoossai giidoogaa oottiya urai merinau de7ana.

English Sentences: Little children, it is the last time: and as ye have heard that antichrist shall come, even now are there many antichrists; whereby we know that it is the last time.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta naatoo, wodiyaa wurssettai matattiis; Kiristtoosa morkkee sinttappe yaanaagaa intte siyidoogaadan, harai atto ha77ikka a morkketi daroti denddidosona. Hegaa gishshau, wodiyaa wurssettai matattidoogaa nuuni hegan eroos.

English Sentences: They went out from us, but they were not of us; for if they had been of us, they would no doubt have continued with us: but they went out, that they might be made manifest that they were not all of us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha morkketi nu bagga gidenna gishshau, nu giddoppe kiyidosona; aissi giikko, eti nu bagga gidiyaabaa gidiyaakko, nu giddon de7ana; shin etappe ooninne nu bagga gidennaagee erettana mala, nu giddoppe kiyidosona.

English Sentences: But ye have an unction from the Holy One, and ye know all things.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Kiristtoosi intte bolli Geeshsha Ayyaanaa gussiis; qassi intte ubbai tumaa ereeta.

English Sentences: I have not written unto you because ye know not the truth, but because ye know it, and that no lie is of the truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tumaa intte eriyo gishshaunne qassi tuman worddoi aibinne bainnaagaa intte eriyo gishshau, taani intteyyo xaafaisippe attin, tumaa intte erenna gishshau xaafikke.

English Sentences: Who is a liar but he that denieth that Jesus is the Christ? He is antichrist, that denieth the Father and the Son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa giyoogee Kiristtoosa gidin erikke giya urappe attin, worddanchchi oonee? Hegee Aawaanne Na7aa erikke giyaagee Kiristtoosa morkkiyaa.

English Sentences: Whosoever denieth the Son, the same hath not the Father: he that acknowledgeth the Son hath the Father also.
Wolaitta Sentences: Na7aa erikke giya oonaaninne Aawai de7enna; Na7aa erais giya oonaanikka qassi Aawai de7ees.

English Sentences: Let that therefore abide in you, which ye have heard from the beginning. If that which ye have heard from the beginning shall remain in you, ye also shall continue in the Son, and in the Father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, koiroosappe intte siyidoogaa intte wozanan minttidi naagite. Koiroosappe siyidoogaa intte naagikko, intteyyo qassi Na7aaranne Aawaara issippetettai de7ana.

English Sentences: And this is the promise that he hath promised us, even eternal life.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Kiristtoosi ba huuphen nuuyyo immana giidoogee merinaa de7uwaa.

English Sentences: These things have I written unto you concerning them that seduce you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani hagaa intteyyo he inttena balettiya asatu gishshau xaafaas.

English Sentences: But the anointing which ye have received of him abideth in you, and ye need not that any man teach you: but as the same anointing teacheth you of all things, and is truth, and is no lie, and even as it hath taught you, ye shall abide in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Kiristtoosi intte bolli ba Geeshsha Ayyaanaa gussiis. Geeshsha Ayyaanai inttenan de7iyo gishshau, ooninne inttena tamaarissana koshshenna; aissi giikko, a Geeshsha Ayyaanai inttena ubbabaa tamaarissees. I tamaarissidoogaadan, Kiristtoosan de7ite.

English Sentences: And now, little children, abide in him; that, when he shall appear, we may have confidence, and not be ashamed before him at his coming.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta naatoo, qassi i qoncciyo wode, nuuni yashshi bainnaageeta gidanaadaaninne, a yuussaa gallassi a sinttan nuuni yeellatennaadan, aani de7ite.

English Sentences: If ye know that he is righteous, ye know that every one that doeth righteousness is born of him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiristtoosi xillo gidiyoogaa intte erikko, xillobaa oottiya ubbai Xoossaa na7a gidiyoogaa eranau bessees.

English Sentences: Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God: therefore the world knoweth us not, because it knew him not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni Xoossaa naata geetettidi xeesettana mala, Xoossai nuna ai keenaa siiqidaakkonne be7ite. Nuuni tumukka a naata. Ha sa7ai Xoossaa erenna gishshau, nunakka erenna.

English Sentences: Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta siiqotoo, ha77i nuuni Xoossaa naata; nuuni ai hananaakko biron erettibeenna; shin Kiristtoosi qoncciyo wode, nuuni a milatanaagaa eroos. Aissi giikko, i tumu de7iyoogaa nuuni be7ana.

English Sentences: And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself, even as he is pure.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Kiristtoosa be7ana giidi ufaissan naagiya ooninne Kiristtoosi geeshsha gididoogaadan, bana geeshshees.

English Sentences: Whosoever committeth sin transgresseth also the law: for sin is the transgression of the law.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nagara oottiya ubbai Xoossaa higgiyaa menttees; aissi giikko, nagari higge menttiyoogaa.

English Sentences: And ye know that he was manifested to take away our sins; and in him is no sin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiristtoosi asaa nagaraa xaissanau qonccidoogaa intte ereeta; aani nagari baawa.

English Sentences: Whosoever abideth in him sinneth not: whosoever sinneth hath not seen him, neither known him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiristtoosan de7iya ooninne nagara oottenna; qassi nagaraa oottiya ooninne a be7ibeenna woi eribeenna.

English Sentences: Little children, let no man deceive you: he that doeth righteousness is righteous, even as he is righteous.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta naatoo, ooninne inttena balettoppo. Kiristtoosi xillo gidiyoogaadan, xillobaa oottiya urai xillo.

English Sentences: He that committeth sin is of the devil; for the devil sinneth from the beginning. For this purpose the Son of God was manifested, that he might destroy the works of the devil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xalahe halaqai koiroosappe nagaraa oottido gishshau, nagara ubba wode oottiya urai xalahe halaqaassa; hegaa gishshau, Xoossaa Na7ai xalahe halaqaa oosuwaa xaissanau qoncciis.

English Sentences: Whosoever is born of God doth not commit sin; for his seed remaineth in him: and he cannot sin, because he is born of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa na7a gidiya ooninne Xoossaa meretai aani de7iyo gishshau, nagara ubba wode oottenna; qassi Xoossai a Aawaa gidiyo gishshau, nagara oottanau danddayenna.

English Sentences: In this the children of God are manifest, and the children of the devil: whosoever doeth not righteousness is not of God, neither he that loveth not his brother.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa naatu giddooninne xalahe halaqaa naatu giddon de7iya dummatettai hagan erettees; xillobaa oottenna urai woikko ba ishaa siiqenna urai ooninne Xoossaa Na7a gidenna.

English Sentences: For this is the message that ye heard from the beginning, that we should love one another.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, koiroosappe intte siyido kiitai, "Issoi issuwaara siiqettanau bessees" yaagiyaagaa.

English Sentences: Not as Cain, who was of that wicked one, and slew his brother. And wherefore slew he him? Because his own works were evil, and his brother's righteous.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni Qaayeela mala gidanau bessenna. Qaayeeli xalahe halaqaassa; yaanidi ba ishaa woriis. I ba ishaa aissi woridee? I oottido oosoi iita gidin, a ishai oottido oosoi lo77o gidido gishshau woriis.

English Sentences: Marvel not, my brethren, if the world hate you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta ishatoo, ha sa7aa asai inttena ixxikko, oorattabaa gooppite.

English Sentences: We know that we have passed from death unto life, because we love the brethren. He that loveth not his brother abideth in death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni nu ishata siiqiyo gishshau, haiquwaappe de7uwau pinnidoogaa eroos; ba ishaa siiqenna urai ooninne haiquwaa giddon de7ees.

English Sentences: Whosoever hateth his brother is a murderer: and ye know that no murderer hath eternal life abiding in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba ishaa ixxiya ooninne shemppo woridaagaa; qassi shemppo woridaagan merinaa de7oi bainnaagaa intte ereeta.

English Sentences: Hereby perceive we the love of God, because he laid down his life for us: and we ought to lay down our lives for the brethren.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiristtoosi ba shemppuwaa nu gishshau aattidi immidoogan siiqoi aibakko nuuni erida; nuunikka nu ishatu gishshau, nu shemppuwaa aattidi immanau bessees.

English Sentences: But whoso hath this world's good, and seeth his brother have need, and shutteth up his bowels of compassion from him, how dwelleth the love of God in him?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin dure asi ooninne ba ishai metootiyoogaa be7iiddi, ayyo qarettennan ixxikko, ba wozanan Xoossaa siiqoi de7ees gaanau waani danddayii?

English Sentences: My little children, let us not love in word, neither in tongue; but in deed and in truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta naatoo, nuuni oosuwaaninne tumatettan siiqettanaappe attin, coo haasayan woikko bolla doonan siiqettanau bessenna.

English Sentences: And hereby we know that we are of the truth, and shall assure our hearts before him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni tumaa baggan de7iyoogaa hegan erana; qassi nu wozanai nu bolli pirddiyo wode ubban, Xoossaa sinttan tumatettaa nuna hegan erissees.

English Sentences: For if our heart condemn us, God is greater than our heart, and knoweth all things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Xoossai nu wozanaappe gita; qassi i ubbabaa erees.

English Sentences: Beloved, if our heart condemn us not, then have we confidence toward God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta siiqotoo, nu wozanai nu bolli pirddennabaa gidikko, nuuni Xoossaa sinttan yayyokko.

English Sentences: And whatsoever we ask, we receive of him, because we keep his commandments, and do those things that are pleasing in his sight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni a azazuwaa naagiyo gishshaunne a ufaissiyaabaa oottiyo gishshau, woossiyo ubbabaa appe ekkoos.

English Sentences: And this is his commandment, That we should believe on the name of his Son Jesus Christ, and love one another, as he gave us commandment.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa azazoi hagaa: Kiristtoosi nuna azazidoogaadankka, Xoossaa Na7aa Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunttan nuuni ammananaadaaninne issoi issuwaara siiqettanaadan Xoossai nuna azaziis.

English Sentences: And he that keepeth his commandments dwelleth in him, and he in him. And hereby we know that he abideth in us, by the Spirit which he hath given us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa azazuwaa naagiya ooninne Xoossaa giddon de7ees; Xoossainne a giddon de7ees; Xoossai nuuyyo immido Geeshsha Ayyaanaa baggaara i nu giddon de7iyoogaa nuuni eroos.

English Sentences: Beloved, believe not every spirit, but try the spirits whether they are of God: because many false prophets are gone out into the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta siiqotoo, ayyaanata ubbata ammanoppite; shin eti Xoossaappe yiidaakkonne akeekite. Aissi giikko, hananabaa yootiya daro worddoti ubbasaa biidosona.

English Sentences: Hereby know ye the Spirit of God: Every spirit that confesseth that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is of God:
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa Ayyaana gidiyoogaa intte hegan erana; "Yesuus Kiristtoosi asa gididi yiidoogaa ammanais" giya ayyaana ubbai Xoossaappe yees.

English Sentences: And every spirit that confesseth not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is not of God: and this is that spirit of antichrist, whereof ye have heard that it should come; and even now already is it in the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Kiristtoosi asa gididi yiidoogaa ammanais geenna ayyaana ubbai Xoossaappe yibeenna; hegee Kiristtoosa morkkiya ayyaana. Intte he ayyaanai yaanaagaa kase siyideta; i harai atto ha77ikka ha sa7an de7ees.

English Sentences: Ye are of God, little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta naatoo, intte Xoossaageeta; intte giddon de7iya Geeshsha Ayyaanai ha sa7an de7iya ayyaanaappe daro wolqqaamiyo gishshau, hananabaa yootiya worddota intte xoonideta.

English Sentences: They are of the world: therefore speak they of the world, and the world heareth them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ha sa7aa asa gidiyo gishshau, ha sa7aabaa haasayoosona; ha sa7aa asaikka eta haasayaa siyees.

English Sentences: We are of God: he that knoweth God heareth us; he that is not of God heareth not us. Hereby know we the spirit of truth, and the spirit of error.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni Xoossaageeta; Xoossaa eriya ooninne nuuni giyoogaa siyees. Xoossaa erenna ooninne nuuni giyoogaa siyenna. Nuuni tumu ayyaanaanne worddo ayyaanaa hegan shaakkoos.

English Sentences: Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta siiqotoo, siiqoi Xoossaappe yiyo gishshau, ane issoi issuwaara siiqettoos. Siiqiya ooninne Xoossaa na7a; Xoossaa i erees.

English Sentences: He that loveth not knoweth not God; for God is love.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai siiqo gidiyo gishshau, siiqenna urai ooninne Xoossaa erenna.

English Sentences: In this was manifested the love of God toward us, because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai nuna ba siiquwaa hagan bessiis; nuuni Kiristtoosa baggaara de7uwaa demmana mala, ba issi Na7aa ha sa7aa kiittiis.

English Sentences: Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins.
Wolaitta Sentences: Siiqo giyoogee hagaa; Xoossai nuna siiqidi, nuuni nu nagaraappe maarotettaa demmido ba Na7aa nuuyyo kiittiisippe attin, nuuni a siiqidoogaana gidenna.

English Sentences: Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta siiqotoo, Xoossai nuna hagaadan siiqidabaa gidikko, nuunikka issoi issuwaara siiqettanau bessees.

English Sentences: No man hath seen God at any time. If we love one another, God dwelleth in us, and his love is perfected in us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa ooninne mulekka be7ibeenna; nuuni issoi issuwaara siiqettikko, Xoossai nu giddon de7ees; a siiqoikka nu giddon polettiis.

English Sentences: Hereby know we that we dwell in him, and he in us, because he hath given us of his Spirit.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai ba Geeshsha Ayyaanaa nuuyyo immido gishshau, nuuni Xoossaa giddon de7iyoogaanne ikka nu giddon de7iyoogaa eroos.

English Sentences: And we have seen and do testify that the Father sent the Son to be the Saviour of the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aawai ba Na7aa ha sa7aa ashshiyaagaa gidanau kiittidoogaa nuuni be7idi markkattoos.

English Sentences: Whosoever shall confess that Jesus is the Son of God, God dwelleth in him, and he in God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi Xoossaa Na7aa gidiyoogaa markkattiya o giddooninne Xoossai de7ees; ikka Xoossaa giddon de7ees.

English Sentences: And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us. God is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai nuna siiqiyoogaa nuuni nu huuphen eroosinne ammanoos. Xoossai siiqo. Siiquwan de7iya ooninne Xoossaa giddon de7ees; Xoossaikka a giddon de7ees.

English Sentences: Herein is our love made perfect, that we may have boldness in the day of judgment: because as he is, so are we in this world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu de7oi ha sa7an Kiristtoosi de7idoogaa mala gidiyo gishshau, pirddaa gallassi nuuni yayyenna mala, siiqoi nu giddon polettiis.

English Sentences: There is no fear in love; but perfect love casteth out fear: because fear hath torment. He that feareth is not made perfect in love.
Wolaitta Sentences: Siiquwan yashshi baawa; shin tumu siiqoi yashshaa kessi olees. Yashshainne qaxxayoi issippe biyo gishshau, yayyiya uraa siiqoi kumetta gidenna.

English Sentences: We love him, because he first loved us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai koiro nuna siiqido gishshau, nuuni a siiqoos.

English Sentences: If a man say, I love God, and hateth his brother, he is a liar: for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen, how can he love God whom he hath not seen?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ooninne, "Taani Xoossaa siiqais" giidi ba ishaa ixxikko, i worddanchcha. Aissi giikko, be7ido ba ishaa siiqennaagee be7ibeenna Xoossaa siiqanau waani danddayii?

English Sentences: And this commandment have we from him, That he who loveth God love his brother also.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Kiristtoosi nuuyyo immido azazoi hagaa; Xoossaa siiqiya urai ba ishaakka siiqanau bessees.

English Sentences: Whosoever believeth that Jesus is the Christ is born of God: and every one that loveth him that begat loveth him also that is begotten of him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiristtoosa yaagidi, Yesuusa ammaniya ooninne Xoossaa na7a; qassi Aawaa siiqiya ooninne a Na7aakka siiqees.

English Sentences: By this we know that we love the children of God, when we love God, and keep his commandments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni Xoossaa siiqiyoogaaninne a azazuwaa naagiyoogan, Xoossaa naata siiqiyoogaa eroos.

English Sentences: For this is the love of God, that we keep his commandments: and his commandments are not grievous.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, nuuni Xoossaa siiqiyoogee a azazuwaa naagiyoogaa; a azazoikka deexo gidenna.

English Sentences: For whatsoever is born of God overcometh the world: and this is the victory that overcometh the world, even our faith.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Xoossaa na7a gidiya ooninne ha sa7aa xoonanau danddayees; nuunikka ha sa7aa xoonanaagee nu ammanuwaana.

English Sentences: Who is he that overcometh the world, but he that believeth that Jesus is the Son of God?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha sa7aa xoonanau danddayiyai oonee? Yesuusi Xoossaa Na7aa gidiyoogaa ammaniyaagaa xalaalai xoonana.

English Sentences: This is he that came by water and blood, even Jesus Christ; not by water only, but by water and blood. And it is the Spirit that beareth witness, because the Spirit is truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haattaaranne suuttaara yiidaagee hagaa; ikka Yesuus Kiristtoosa; haattaaranne suuttaara i yiidoogaappe attin, haatta xalaalaara yibeenna. Geeshsha Ayyaanai tuma gidiyo gishshau, hegee tuma gidiyoogaa i ba huuphen markkattees.

English Sentences: For there are three that bear record in heaven, the Father, the Word, and the Holy Ghost: and these three are one.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, heezzu markkati de7oosona.

English Sentences: And there are three that bear witness in earth, the Spirit, and the water, and the blood: and these three agree in one.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeeti Geeshsha Ayyaanaa, haattaanne suuttaa; ha heezzati issoi issuwaagaa phalqqokkona.

English Sentences: If we receive the witness of men, the witness of God is greater: for this is the witness of God which he hath testified of his Son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni asai markkattiyoogaa ammanikko, Xoossai markkattiyoogee asaagaappe keehi aadhdhees; aissi giikko, Xoossai ba Na7aayyo markkattido markkatettai hagaa.

English Sentences: He that believeth on the Son of God hath the witness in himself: he that believeth not God hath made him a liar; because he believeth not the record that God gave of his Son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa Na7aa ammaniya uraa wozanan ha markkatettai de7ees. Xoossaa ammanenna urai ooninne Xoossai ba Na7aayyo markkattido markkatettaa ammanibeenna gishshau, Xoossaa worddanchcha oottiis.

English Sentences: And this is the record, that God hath given to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi markkatettai hagaa; Xoossai nuuyyo merinaa de7uwaa immiis; he de7oikka a Na7an de7ees.

English Sentences: He that hath the Son hath life; and he that hath not the Son of God hath not life.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa Na7ai de7iyo ooyyoonne de7oi de7ees; Xoossaa Na7ai bainna ooyyoonne de7oi baawa.

English Sentences: These things have I written unto you that believe on the name of the Son of God; that ye may know that ye have eternal life, and that ye may believe on the name of the Son of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa Na7aa sunttan ammaniya intteyyo merinaa de7oi de7iyoogaa intte erana mala, hagaa intteyyo xaafaas.

English Sentences: And this is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us:
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai koyiyoogaadan, ainne nuuni a woossikko, i siyiyoogaa nuuni eriyo gishshau, a sinttan yayyokko.

English Sentences: And if we know that he hear us, whatsoever we ask, we know that we have the petitions that we desired of him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni woossiyo ubban i siyiyoogaa erikko, nuuni a woossidoogaa i immanaagaa eroos.

English Sentences: If any man see his brother sin a sin which is not unto death, he shall ask, and he shall give him life for them that sin not unto death. There is a sin unto death: I do not say that he shall pray for it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ooninne haiqoi bessenna nagara ba ishai oottishin be7ikko, Xoossaa woossanau bessees; haiqoi bessenna nagara oottidaageetuyyo Xoossai de7o immana. Haiqoi bessiyo nagari de7ees; taani inttena hegau Xoossaa woossite giikke.

English Sentences: All unrighteousness is sin: and there is a sin not unto death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mooro ooso ubbi nagara; shin haiqoi bessenna nagari de7ees.

English Sentences: We know that whosoever is born of God sinneth not; but he that is begotten of God keepeth himself, and that wicked one toucheth him not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa na7i ooninne nagara ubba wode oottennaagaa nuuni eroos. Aissi giikko, Xoossaa na7ai a naagees; qassi xalahee halaqaikka a qohanau danddayenna.

English Sentences: And we know that we are of God, and the whole world lieth in wickedness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni Xoossaageeta gidiyoogaanne ha mule sa7aikka xalahe halaqan haarettidoogaa eroos.

English Sentences: And we know that the Son of God is come, and hath given us an understanding, that we may know him that is true, and we are in him that is true, even in his Son Jesus Christ. This is the true God, and eternal life.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni tumu Xoossaa eranaadan, Xoossaa Na7ai yiidoogaanne nuuyyo akeekaa immidoogaa eroos. Nuuni tumu Xoossaa giddon, a Na7aa Yesuus Kiristtoosa giddon de7eettees; i tumu Xoossaanne merinaa de7uwaa.

English Sentences: Little children, keep yourselves from idols. Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta naatoo, eeqatuppe intte huuphiyaa naagite.
